Name: Head Archivist Elowen Sirel
Backstory: Elowen disappeared two weeks ago after descending into the Vaults alone. A former mechanist turned lorekeeper, she is known for her obsession with pre-Catastrophe constructs and encrypted codices.

Name: Scholar Brannic Vohl
Backstory: A stern and secretive man in his late 60s, Brannic once advised nobles on arcane matters. He now spends his days deciphering star charts and muttering about 'the return of the machine gods'.

Name: Scholar Mireya of Dunfold
Backstory: Once a traveling historian, she settled in Karnstadt after an illness left her with a persistent limp. She is kind, deeply empathetic, and has an encyclopedic memory for folklore.

Name: Scribe Noll Greystone
Backstory: A former monk turned copyist, Noll is meticulous and easily startled. He often eavesdrops and records more than he’s asked to, storing secret copies in a hidden satchel.

Name: Scribe Halvia Nent
Backstory: Halvia was raised in the chapel orphanage and sent to the Library due to her neat handwriting. She is devout, quietly ambitious, and may secretly worship Edras.

Name: Apprentice Varn
Backstory: A shy, wiry teenager with ink-stained fingers, Varn was found abandoned outside the gates. He worships Ori like a folk hero and dreams of being a 'truth-finder'.

Name: Apprentice Elsbet Ruun
Backstory: Daughter of a disgraced noble, Elsbet was sent to the Library for protection. She’s rebellious, sharp-tongued, and has a secret stash of banned romantic epics.
